channel.title: End-of-Life on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in End-of-Life on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: Retirement: Azure Computer Vision – Image Analysis will be retired on September 25, 2028
item.description:
Microsoft announced the planned retirement of the Azure Computer Vision – Image Analysis service, with full support provided through September 25, 2028.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Deprecation of Node 20 on GitHub Actions runners
item.description:
GitHub has started deprecating Node 20 on GitHub Actions runners because Node 20 reaches end-of-life in April 2026. They plan to migrate all actions off Node 20 and communicated this on the GitHub Blog.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: Retirement: Azure CDN – Migrate to Azure Front Door on December 1, 2025
item.description:
Azure CDN in Microsoft Azure operated by 21Vianet (Azure China) will be retired on December 1, 2025. Customers using Azure CDN in China must migrate to alternative services such as Azure Front Door before that date. The service is built on local CDN providers’ POPs.

  • Source: Azure Updates
